hibernate-mapping.query: select user from User user where user.loginId=?1 and user.password=?2
select user from User user where user.loginId like ?1
select con.concentrationId, con.concentrationName from Concentration con
hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT stdnt.STUDENT_ID, stdnt.FIRST_NAME, stdnt.LAST_NAME, stdnt.PHONE_NUMBER, stdnt.UCM_EMAIL, stdnt.OTHER_EMAIL, stdnt.GRE_SCORE, stdnt.MAILING_ADDRESS, stdnt.ENTRY_DATE, con.CONCENTRATION_NAME, usr.user_name, stdntcon.status, stdntcon.STATUS_CHANGE_DATE, stdntcon.STU_CON_ID FROM ucm_mba.students stdnt left JOIN ucm_mba.student_concentration stdntcon on stdnt.STUDENT_ID = stdntcon.STUDENT_ID left JOIN ucm_mba.concentrations con on con.CONCENTRATION_ID = stdntcon.CONCENTRATION_ID left JOIN ucm_mba.sps_users usr on usr.USER_ID = stdntcon.ADVISOR

SELECT stdnt.STUDENT_ID, stdnt.FIRST_NAME, stdnt.LAST_NAME, stdnt.PHONE_NUMBER, stdnt.UCM_EMAIL, stdnt.OTHER_EMAIL, stdnt.GRE_SCORE, stdnt.MAILING_ADDRESS, stdnt.ENTRY_DATE, con.CONCENTRATION_NAME, usr.user_name, stdntcon.status, stdntcon.STATUS_CHANGE_DATE, stdntcon.STU_CON_ID FROM ucm_mba.students stdnt left JOIN ucm_mba.student_concentration stdntcon on stdnt.STUDENT_ID = stdntcon.STUDENT_ID left JOIN ucm_mba.concentrations con on con.CONCENTRATION_ID = stdntcon.CONCENTRATION_ID left JOIN ucm_mba.sps_users usr on usr.USER_ID = stdntcon.ADVISOR Where stdntcon.status != 'Accepted'
hibernate-mapping.query: select new com.mydomain.sps.bean.ConcentrationBean(con.concentrationId,con.concentrationName,con.degreeCode,con.active,user.userName) from Concentration con,ConcentrationFaculty conFac,User user where con.concentrationId = conFac.concentrationId.concentrationId and conFac.faculty.userId = user.userId and user.active = 1
select user.userId,user.userName from User user where user.active=1 and user.role in ('Advisor')
hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT note.NOTES, note.REVIEW_DATE FROM ucm_mba.review_notes note where note.STUDENT_ID=?1

SELECT usr.USER_ID, usr.USER_NAME FROM ucm_mba.concentrations con JOIN ucm_mba.concentration_faculty fac on con.CONCENTRATION_ID = fac.CONCENTRATION_ID JOIN ucm_mba.sps_users usr on fac.FACULTY_ID = usr.USER_ID where con.CONCENTRATION_NAME = ?1
hibernate-mapping.query: select que from Questions que where que.concentration.concentrationId=?1 and que.active=1
hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT count(*) FROM ucm_mba.sps_users where user_name=?1

SELECT con.STUDENT_ID, con.CONCENTRATION_ID, con.STU_CON_ID, con.exam_status FROM ucm_mba.students std JOIN ucm_mba.student_concentration con on con.STUDENT_ID = std.STUDENT_ID where std.FIRST_NAME = ?1
SELECT exam.QUESTION_ID, exam.STD_ANSWER FROM ucm_mba.student_exam exam where exam.STD_CON_ID = ?1
hibernate-mapping.query: select new com.mydomain.sps.bean.ConcentrationBean(con.concentrationId,con.concentrationName,con.degreeCode,con.active,user.userName) from Concentration con,ConcentrationFaculty conFac,User user where con.concentrationId = conFac.concentrationId.concentrationId and conFac.faculty.userId = user.userId and user.active = 1 and ( con.concentrationName like ?1 or con.degreeCode like ?1 or user.userName like ?1 )
select con.concentrationId from Concentration con where con.concentrationName = ?1
select conFac.conSerialNo from ConcentrationFaculty conFac where conFac.concentrationId.concentrationId = ?1
